Shadow Lance.name: Shadow Lance
Shadow Lance.fullText:
Shadowthief Attack 11Shadow Lance

A potent spike of darkness lances out at your foe, sundering its life force for your own use.

Encounter        Arcane, Implement, Necrotic, Shadow
Standard Action      Ranged 10

Target: One creature

Attack: Intelligence or Charisma vs. Fortitude

Hit: 2d10 + Intelligence or Charisma modifier necrotic damage.

Effect: You gain one shadow. If the attack hits, you instead gain two shadows. If the attack reduces the target to 0 hit points, you instead gain three shadows. These shadows are in addition to the ones you gain from your Shadow Feast path feature.


Published in Heroes of Shadow, page(s) 150.
Shadow Lance.flavor: A potent spike of darkness lances out at your foe, sundering its life force for your own use.
Shadow Lance.onHit: 2d10 + Intelligence or Charisma modifier necrotic damage.
Shadow Lance.effect: You gain one shadow. If the attack hits, you instead gain two shadows. If the attack reduces the target to 0 hit points, you instead gain three shadows. These shadows are in addition to the ones you gain from your Shadow Feast path feature.

Shadowcurse Cataclysm.name: Shadowcurse Cataclysm
Shadowcurse Cataclysm.fullText:
Shadowthief Attack 20Shadowcurse Cataclysm

You raise your hands to the sky, calling down a storm of shadow against your foes.

Daily        Arcane, Implement, Necrotic, Shadow
Standard Action      Close burst 10

Target: One enemy in the burst; for every two shadows you spend, this power targets an additional enemy in the burst.

Attack: Intelligence or Charisma vs. Fortitude

Hit: 5d6 + Intelligence or Charisma modifier necrotic damage, and the target is immobilized (save ends).

Miss: Half damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.


Published in Heroes of Shadow, page(s) 150.
Shadowcurse Cataclysm.flavor: You raise your hands to the sky, calling down a storm of shadow against your foes.
Shadowcurse Cataclysm.target: One enemy in the burst; for every two shadows you spend, this power targets an additional enemy in the burst.
Shadowcurse Cataclysm.onHit: 5d6 + Intelligence or Charisma modifier necrotic damage, and the target is immobilized (save ends).
Shadowcurse Cataclysm.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.

Shadow Walk.name: Shadow Walk
Shadow Walk.fullText:
Shadowthief Utility 12Shadow Walk

The shadows of the creatures you have slain unfurl across the battlefield, forming a path that only you can walk.

Encounter        Arcane, Shadow, Teleportation
Move Action      Personal

Requirement: You must have at least one shadow available to spend.

Effect: You spend at least one shadow and teleport up to 5 squares plus 2 squares per additional shadow spent.


Published in Heroes of Shadow, page(s) 150.
Shadow Walk.flavor: The shadows of the creatures you have slain unfurl across the battlefield, forming a path that only you can walk.
Shadow Walk.requirement: You must have at least one shadow available to spend.
Shadow Walk.effect: You spend at least one shadow and teleport up to 5 squares plus 2 squares per additional shadow spent.
